LanguageData.EMPPulse.label: fire EMP
LanguageData.EMPPulse.description: Emit a burst of electromagnetic energy centered on the user. The burst will stun nearby mechanical targets like mechanoids or turrets.
LanguageData.LaunchEMPShell.label: launch EMP shell
LanguageData.LaunchEMPShell.description: Launch a shell that releases a burst of electromagnetic energy, stunning mechanical targets. Can be reloaded using steel.
LanguageData.LaunchFragGrenade.label: launch frag grenade
LanguageData.LaunchFragGrenade.description: Launch a grenade. Can be reloaded using steel.
LanguageData.LaunchIncendiaryShell.label: launch incendiary shell
LanguageData.LaunchIncendiaryShell.description: Launch a shell that creates an explosion on impact, igniting everything nearby. Can be reloaded using chemfuel.
LanguageData.LaunchSmokeShell.label: launch smoke shell
LanguageData.LaunchSmokeShell.description: Launch a smoke shell that obscures incoming shots and prevents turrets from locking on. Can be reloaded using steel.
